name: Quiver-A Decision Support System for SE
short_description:
Quiver is one step to decision support for software engineering. Started as the dissertation work done by Abhilash as part of Masters Software Systems at BITS Pilani 
http://sourceforge.net/projects/quiver-dss/files/AG-SemPresent1.0.pdf/download

Stage 2
The project got a big review  in the CONSEG 2011 conference organized by Computer Society of India (CSI). 
http://www.ebay.in/itm/Proceedings-International-Conference-Software-Engineering-CONSEG-2011-/270829182208
The requirements of Quiver 2 are discussed at:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/quiver-dss/files/Requirements_Project002.pdf/download

SEAMLESS SOFTWARE ENGINEERING– A STEP TOWARDS
AUTOMATION OF SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT LIFECYCLE
Software engineering the entire of software development
lifecycle, still requires human intervention in every step. .
 With automation as the final goal, they put forward a concept called seamless engineering as a step towards achieving automation..
summary: Quiver is concieved -Decision Support System for Software Engineering
